attributes.action: Change the law to protect our Armed Forces from "no win no fee" law firms.
attributes.background: Successive Governments have sent our Armed Forces to fight on their behalf in Conflicts around the globe, only to abandon them later. We demand the law be changed to stop the persecution of our Armed Forces by "no win no fee" law firms.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like to see to the law.
